formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ExitWhile' =-
[Synopsis] End a While loop
[Description] Usage: ExitWhile() Exits a While loop, whether or not the conditional has been satisfied.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,4 @@ End a While loop
[Description] - Usage: ExitWhile() - Exits a While loop, whether or not the conditional has been satisfied. + ExitWhile(): Exits a While() loop, whether or not the conditional has been satisfied.
